quest.name: The Oracle of Light
journal: With the operation fast approaching, Lyna means to put you to work.

For the operation, it appears that the amaro must be given the selfsame serum that you were compelled to take. In order to encourage the beasts to cooperate, the foul concoction has been sprinkled on their fodder. All that remains is to see them fed. Lyna bids you assist in this task, and directs you to fetch the fodder from the amaro launch.
You have obtained the fodder. Time to see if the amaro will be fooled.
Though some amaro are plainly unimpressed by the taste, they all devour the fodder. Lyna will be eager for your report.
The preparations for the operation proceed apace, and Lyna instructs you to make ready and await deployment at the top of the main watchtower.

The operation has begun. From your vantage point overlooking Laxan Loft, you watch as the dream powder takes effect on the Eulmoran soldiers below. At Lyna's command, you mount your amaro and descend on the stronghold to rescue Minfilia.

You make your way through Laxan Loft and succeed in finding Minfilia, only to find your path barred by General Ran'jit, who effortlessly overpowers you. Just when it seems twisted Eulmoran justice is to be your fate, help arrives in the form of Thancred. Though he too is no match for your foe, he does enough to create an opening for you to flee, and leads you away to the neighboring region of Il Mheg, where you should be safe from pursuit. However, a new predicament soon presents itself, as mischievous voices ring out everywhere and nowhere, and some manner of enchantment takes the party in its grip.

※If you leave Il Mheg, you may re-enter via the gate on Lakeland's northwestern border.

In vexed tones, Thancred explains that Il Mheg is the home of the fae folk, the most prominent of whom are the pixies. These mischievous souls employ powerful illusions to play tricks on trespassers, and you are now completely at their mercy...
objectives: Feed the treated fodder to the amaro.

dialogue.name: AMAROA03304
dialogue.text: Gwee, gwee!

dialogue.name: AMAROB03304
dialogue.text: Gwee...

dialogue.name: AMAROC03304
dialogue.text: Gwee, gwee! Gweeeeee!

dialogue.name: AMAROD03304
dialogue.text: Gwee?

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: In readiness for the operation, the amaro will need to be treated with the same serum as us.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: As you well know, however, it is not pleasant. In order to coax them into taking it, we have sprinkled it on their fodder.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: All that remains is to feed it to them. A task I am sure you will enjoy. Fetch the fodder from the amaro launch and see to four of the beasts. Dismissed.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: The treated fodder is by the launch. Report back to me when you've finished feeding the patients.

dialogue.name: AMAROA03304
dialogue.text: Gwee, gwee! Gwee!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The amaro happily devours the fodder.

dialogue.name: AMAROB03304
dialogue.text: Gwee? Gwee...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The amaro absent-mindedly munches on the fodder.

dialogue.name: AMAROC03304
dialogue.text: Gwee, gwee, gwee! Gwee, gwee!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The amaro is wary at first, but appetite eventually wins out and it accepts the fodder.

dialogue.name: AMAROD03304
dialogue.text: Gwee? Khrrr...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The amaro reels at the smell, but accepts the fodder nonetheless.

dialogue.name: AMAROA03304
dialogue.text: Gwee, gwee!

dialogue.name: AMAROB03304
dialogue.text: Gwee... Gwee...

dialogue.name: AMAROC03304
dialogue.text: Gweeeeee!

dialogue.name: AMAROD03304
dialogue.text: Khrrr...

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: The amaro are fed?

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Good. The rest have already been dosed, so we need not fear any of our mounts succumbing to the dream powder.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: All units have now entered the final stages of their preparations. The time is nigh.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Make ready, and await deployment atop the main watchtower. I will send your uniform along as soon as it arrives.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: That is all. May night smile upon us.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Why are you still here? Go and await deployment atop the main watchtower.

dialogue.name: CRYSTARIUMGARDPICKET
dialogue.text: The operation is about to commence! Stand ready!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: During the operation, some of your gear will be glamoured. Your attributes and abilities will be unaffected.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Th-Thank you. Are you...from the Crystarium?

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Correct. We've come to rescue you.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Your weapons─made to the same specifications as Thancred's.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Be ready to use them.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: U-Understood. Please lead the way.

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: Hmph, brazen thieves.

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: You will regret coming here.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Continue with the main scenario quest?

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Faeries, I take it?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I was worried about the others back in Lakeland, but maybe I should be worried about us.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I'm trying my best to remember...but it feels like peering through fog.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Il Mheg is the faerie kingdom, and as one might expect, it is home to the fae folk.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: The most prominent among them are the pixies, who have a penchant for making mischief. They use powerful illusions to play tricks on all who venture into their domain.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: By way of an example, they can make a familiar path seem wholly unfamiliar, or lead you to believe you're somewhere you're not.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: And we are now, I am sorry to say, entirely at their mercy.

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Fight your way to Minfilia!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Escape from Laxan Loft!

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Defeat Ran'jit!

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: The first contingent has already entered. Let us follow.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: There you are, Forename! Mayhap you could lend us a hand!

dialogue.name: EULMORESOLDIER03305A
dialogue.text: Reinforcements! We need reinforcements!

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: My men will occupy the enemy while we rescue the Oracle.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Come, we keep close to the wall!

dialogue.name: EULMORESOLDIER03305A
dialogue.text: They're here too! To arms, to arms!

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Damn it. Let's make this quick!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: You certainly took your time. Let's cut a path through this rabble and keep moving!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Your zeal is admirable, Sister, but we were told to avoid enemy attention, not invite it!

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: We do not have time. Leave them to the guard.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Eulmore may boast the world's largest army...

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: But woman for woman, we are no less mighty!

dialogue.name: EULMORESOLDIER03305B
dialogue.text: Intruders! Stop them!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Gah, not again!

dialogue.name: EULMORESOLDIER03305C
dialogue.text: Crystarium scum!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: This is no token force. They were serious about invading.

dialogue.name: EULMORESOLDIER03305D
dialogue.text: If you can stand, you can fight! Push them back!

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: There are more still standing than I would have liked...

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: But we must press on regardless. The longer we take, the harder our task will become.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We don't seem to be getting anywhere...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Forename, Lyna─go on ahead! We'll hold them here!

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Understood. With me, Forename!

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: The way is relatively clear. Good.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: There she is!

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Quickly─free her!

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Let's rejoin the others and quit this place.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: All this trouble because of me... I'm so sorry...

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Save your apologies until after we've escaped.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: It's quiet. Too quiet.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: Is that...Ran'jit!? This will not end well...

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: You will return to Eulmore.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: N-No! I won't go back to that cell!

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: It is for your own protection.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Ah!

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: Pathetic.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Are you all right!?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I-I'm fine... I just...can't move...

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: Stay there while I tend to these vermin.

dialogue.name: LYNA
dialogue.text: The tales do not lie. He is fierce beyond reckoning. We are outmatched!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: He cannot maintain this onslaught forever! Be prepared to run!

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: You will do no such thing.

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: And now it is just you and me.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Ungh... Be careful, Forename!

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: You are made of sterner stuff than the rest.

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: But will it be enough...?

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: Gukumatz, do my bidding!

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: It seems you are no ordinary soldier.

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: You are persistent, that I will allow.

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: I have your measure now. The game is up.

dialogue.name: RANJIT
dialogue.text: Know your folly.
